General.Name: Good Finance Securities Co Ltd
General.Description: Good Finance Securities Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the securities agency and brokerage business in Taiwan. The company operates through Client Partner, Investment, Investment Bank, Futures, and All Other segments. It engages in the brokerage of marketable securities on the centralized securities exchange market; proprietary trading of securities on the centralized securities exchange market and at the over-the-counter; operating securities trading margin purchase and short sales; brokerage and trading of securities at the over-the-counter; underwriting of securities; concurrent operation of futures business; consignment trading of foreign securities; agency for stock affairs; securities investment consulting; and other securities-related businesses. The company was formerly known as Ta Ching Securities Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Good Finance Securities Co., Ltd. in December 2021. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 174 and No. 176, Minsheng East Road, Taipei, Taiwan
